popup.title: Fusion Live Assist
popup.acceptWebcam: Please allow LiveAssist to access your webcam by clicking 'Allow' above.

notice.noAgents: There are currently no agents available. Please try again.
notice.navigateAwayAssist: You have gone to a page without Live Assist. Your video and voice are still being transmitted to the Live Assist agent while this window is open.
notice.promptToAllowScreenShare: Would you like to enable sharing of your current browser window?

error.noWebRTC: Sorry, your browser does not appear to support WebRTC.
error.popupBlocked: Your browser has blocked a pop-up window required for Live Assist to work. Please allow pop-ups from this site, and reload this page.

shareFail.message: __targetType__ that the agent has attempted to share with you has failed to load.

agent.navigateAwayAssist: The user has left the Live Assist pages. The user's screen is not being shared.

alerts.docPushToUnsupportedPage: You cannot push documents if the consumer is not on an Assist enabled page.
